comments.author: teslag
comments.body: Quote from: Bounty Star on July 10, 2022, 07:52:15 AMDesclaimer: I am not a team member of this project. I was just hired to manage this thread, join or invest at your own risk.I'm sure the project you are campaigning for is very good, I don't think this project will be a scam. This project is different from other platforms that are very interesting and easy to understand by new users.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Bounty Star on July 11, 2022, 06:44:45 PMQuote from: teslag on July 11, 2022, 02:47:47 AMI'm sure the project you are campaigning for is very good, I don't think this project will be a scam. This project is different from other platforms that are very interesting and easy to understand by new users.We hope so! Thank youAs there are many DeFi platforms that exited in this market, what is the chance that this network will survive?What are the positive points that you think will set this network apart from most of the DeFi networks?Some are already losing their trust in DeFi because the hacking incidents are happening on a serious level.Also, the longevity is questionable for most DeFi networks as they can easily go down without a warning.
